name: Guns & Lovers: A Dating Sim
description:
Summary

Some games promote unhealthy relationships with guns -- but not this one. In this first-person dater, you'll meet four guns who are all going through a tough time in their lives. Will you be supportive and form lasting romances or friendships with these guns? Are these guns all really who they say they are? Find out in Guns & Lovers!

Features
  • Pansexual gun love
  • 100% violence-free
  • Animated sprites
  • 4 playable classes
  • Secrets!
Created By
